author: junsong_eth
content:
Hi guys, I have been investigating EIP-4881(Deposit Snapshot) recently, and found that the finalization logic depends on `eth1_deposit_index`, which will be anchored to certain value in the near future. After EIP-6110 fully manages the deposit process via execution requests, deposits (in each CL's deposit cache) would be never finalized, thus there's no pruning deposits at all.
I raised an issue regarding to this(https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/14698), and wonder there's any context or talk about EIP-4881 these days. Feedbacks are welcomed (in case I totally misunderstood the spec)
